description:
Saurva is granted powers by a mysterious white light. Now it is time to get Jahy back everything!
However, the powers are a complete mystery and Saurva can`t control them properly.
Later, Jahy-sama was wondering why Kokoro was ignoring her when she calls out to her.
The Landlord suggests that Kokoro dislikes her now, which puts Jahy-sama`s heart into a downward spiral of doubt.
What is Kokoro`s real reason?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: サルワさんは敗れない!
